meanings.definition: The quality or state of being playful or coquettish, like a kitten.
meanings.sent1: Her kittenishnesses shone through as she giggled and twirled around the room.
meanings.sent2: The kittenishnesses of the young cat made everyone smile as it chased after a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent3: The actress's kittenishnesses on stage charmed the audience and brought a light-hearted touch to the play.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, her kittenishnesses were like a breath of fresh air, adding a playful element to the runway.
meanings.sent5: The kittenishnesses of the puppy were so infectious that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but smile.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of a kitten, such as playfulness or curiosity.
meanings.sent1: The kittenishnesses of the little kitten were evident as it pounced on a toy mouse.
meanings.sent2: Watching the kittenishnesses of the kittens at play always brought a sense of joy to the onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The kittenishnesses of the mischievous kitten got it into all sorts of playful trouble around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with kittenishnesses as she eagerly explored the new toy that had caught her attention.
meanings.sent5: The kittenishnesses of the curious kitten led it to investigate every nook and cranny of the room.
